title: Week 9 Red Challenge Flag Picks & should the Chiefs rush back Mahomes?
itunes:title: Week 9 Red Challenge Flag Picks & should the Chiefs rush back Mahomes?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in the Stage 5 set alongside Matt "Money" Smith and Handsome Hank before the Week 9 games! The guys first talk about if the Browns can actually turn it around and Money's trip home to Chicago last week (2:45). Next up, the group dives into Zaxby's Fresh Takes and debates whether the Chiefs should rush back Patrick Mahomes to ensure home field advantage in the playoffs (9:21)? Then, the gang plays a game of 'Use Your Noodle' as Eddie Spaghetti asks a question about the best rushing totals by running backs in their final year (37:01). Finally, they round out the show with their Red Challenge Flag picks for Week 9 (44:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
